programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Neat freak Claire Diamond is the second host from Hertfordshire. She hopes to excite her guests with a starter of crispy chilli chicken, a main of roast rack of lamb with potato dauphinoise, and a huge dessert of panacotta, meringue and chocolate cheesecake, while trying to keep her house spotlessly clean. The guests all seem to appreciate her menu apart from Amir.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Posh boy and wannabe pop star Charles Maximilian Winnington Leftwich is the third host from Hertfordshire. He hopes his elaborate menu and outdoor music performance will earn him top marks, but its not an easy ride for the young host who lives at home with his mum. The guests struggle with his starter, the rain threatens to spoil the BBQ, and a row develops about how much money Charles receives from his parents.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Earths Natural Wonders
programme.desc: In the high Himalaya, join yak-herder Thokmay Lowa and his small group as he steers his herd through one of the regions extreme mountain passes. In the Canadian Arctic, 63-year-old Minnie Nappaaluk and her granddaughter Eva embark on one of the most hazardous expeditions for food: the mussel harvest. In the blistering Australian outback, the only way to efficiently round up cattle herds on vast farms is through the use of helicopter cowboys like Chris Weyand.

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Showgirl Lorelei and best friend Dorothy embark upon a boat trip to Paris, where Lorelei intends to marry millionaire Gus Esmond. En route, the girls are bedevilled by private detective Malone, hired by Esmonds father to make certain that Lorelei isnt just another gold-digger. When Dorothy falls in love with the poverty-stricken Malone, Lorelei decides to find her pal a wealthier potential husband.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: A dramatic reconstruction of the World War II rout at Dunkirk. The Allied defeat and the subsequent frantic evacuation is told through the experiences of three different characters: a cockney corporal and his men separated from their unit; a newspaper reporter who moves from cool detachment to being willing to lay down his life; and a civilian whose eyes are opened by the dramatic events.

The men responsible for bringing it into the UK had been under covert surveillance for months, but until the fax was discovered, there was no way of proving the gangs involvement in the international drugs trade.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.sub-title: Mould... Always Believe in Your Soul!
programme.desc: The mould in a Hampshire house has Martin singing the blues, Martel needs to watch her step in County Durham, and Dion goes wild in Warrington in an overgrown garden.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp is at the East of England showground in Peterborough, where experts Charles Hanson and David Harper help the teams find potentially profitable items. Natasha also learns how social media has cultivated a new generation of antiques enthusiasts.

programme.desc: Marcus Wareing embraces a slower pace of life down at his Sussex smallholding. Setting out to expand the range of produce and bring in new livestock, his first additions are some new pigs, but he needs to choose animals that will provide him with the best possible meat.

programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Bridge of Lies

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: London and South East England: Starters and Fish
programme.desc: Four chefs compete for London and south east England with canapes, starters and fish dishes inspired by the Olympics and Paralympics, all hoping to cook at a banquet to wish Team GB athletes luck as they head for Paris 2024.

programme.title: Cornwall: This Fishing Life
programme.desc: Padstow is well known for its tourist industry, but theres another lucrative industry here that few visitors are aware of. Each year, Padstows fishermen land hundreds of tonnes of brown crab. But the vast majority bypass the town altogether.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Members of the public try and make money out of their antiques.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: The two shopping celebrities today have travelled from the East End to the West Country. Theyre two of Albert Squares strongest characters, Rita Simons, who played Roxy Mitchell, and Laila Morse, aka Big Mo Harris.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: A frantic mother alerts the lifeguards after six teenagers are cut off by the tide. The Anstruther crew race to the rescue of a female paddleboarder. The reports of a clothed person entering the water lead the Selsey crew to a late-night search.

programme.title: The Newsreader

programme.desc: A tigress is chosen to found a new dynasty. Airlifted from her home in an Indian park to life in a new reserve, Baghani the tigress must fight with leopards for territory and learn to hunt dangerous wild boar. Also released is Rajore, a young male.

programme.desc: Welcome to the CBeebies channel. Programmes start at 6.00am.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula discover a new toy at Ammas creche - a talking ride-on car. It seems like fun until talkie taxi keeps saying the same thing over and over again. When the taxi crashes and is finally silenced, Bing and Sula use their imagination to play the game they really want to play.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky learns to play the didgeridoo. The Teletubbies do a special didgeridoo Tubby Phone Dance. Tiddlytubby Ping loves the didgeridoo too.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Supertato, the worlds first potato superhero as he tackles the mischievous Evil Pea, in the supermarket aisles.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its the bell-ringing-and-singing Pepper performing Twinkle, Twinkle like never heard before.

programme.title: Tee and Mo
programme.desc: Tee enjoys his time in the paddling pool and doesnt want to get out. Can Mo lure him out of it with the promise of a warm bath?

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are building a stone tower in the Howly Woods when Sula finds an ammonite. Bing wants to find one too but is overwhelmed by the amount of stones, which makes it very difficult to find one. A frustrated Bing sits down, and Sula notices some ammonites in the rock behind him. Flop takes a picture of Bing and Sula with their ammonites.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Blue and Yellow meet a new friend: Green. Discover what happens when blue and yellow are mixed.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing dress up when they hear a ghostly sound. They can see that something has spooked the chickens, so they stop what they are doing to investigate. They come across several different items, such as ghostly white footprints.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The squirrels wonder what Duggee is up to. He seems to be looking through a long stick out of the window. Whats that, Duggee? Duggee explains that its a telescope, and hes looking at things far, far away in space!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey wants to know why Dads always bossing her around when she doesnt get what she wants.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum must get Bluey and Bingo out the door in time for their play date with Judo, but the girls wont leave until they finish their game and the sticky rubber gecko falls down from the ceiling.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: At the Go Jet Academy, the Go Jetters are about to watch one of natures most spectacular events - a solar eclipse. They watch in amazement through their pinhole projectors as the moon moves between the Earth and the sun and its shadow throws them into darkness. As the moon moves past the sun, things become light again, but all of a sudden they are thrown into darkness once more.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Wrecked House
programme.desc: When a big storm wrecks the rabbits tree house, piecing it back together leads to big adventure.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: When the Octopods waterworks are flooded with frightened Humuhumu fish, the Octonauts have to find a way to flush them out.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Nine and friends learn all about capacity.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Go and Stop are given some magic beans and make amazingly shaped plants.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: A puncture in the kiddie pool threatens to ruin Love Monsters Pool Party.

programme.title: Playtime Towers
programme.desc: Bella and Lift have fun playing with their favourite red bouncy ball. It bounces into the Ice Disco, where it gives Hettie the Yeti an idea for a bouncy dance!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are in the park with Flop collecting acorns. When Bings pile of acorns keeps getting smaller, Flop shows him where to hide behind a bush to see whats happening to them, a squirrel is the culprit, hiding acorns for winter.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say o, and we go on an adventure around the sound. We meet an octopus and an orangutan, and see an ostrich in an office!

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Tidying-up day arrives for Biba, but she ends up getting upset while cleaning up when her clay star goes missing and she cannot find it.

programme.title: Piggy Builders
programme.desc: Fiona asks the Piggies to help transport her pumpkin to the Vegetable Festival. They agree, not knowing that it is so big, they will have to turn it into a carriage!

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos learn all about down when Toodloo gets on a runaway roller-skate. Back in the Boat, the Twirlywoo Screen creates a course for marbles to roll down.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and a friend make a space rocket and play mini golf. Meanwhile, Lord Tumble attempts to teach Mr Tumble how to play golf, but things dont quite go to plan.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Its party time! The Teletubbies have balloons, party blowers and lots of sparkles. They visit the Tiddlytubbies and do a fun party dance. In Tummy Tales, twins celebrate their birthday with all their friends.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome little ones Alfie, Charlie, Ollie, River, Araiya and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Inside Giovannas bag are numbered building blocks, and all the parents and little ones have toys that are themed around numbers.

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Lou sings a song to conquer his fear, but wakes a sleeping dinosaur.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie feels lonely during her first visit to the chess club, but before long she meets a new friend who helps her turn that desert island feeling into a tropical paradise.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Wedding planner Dylan wants to make sure everything goes right as he plans a wedding, but he must get creative when an "I do" snafu occurs on the big day.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey runs to catch up to Mum as she goes for a walk at the beach. She comes across a series of fun encounters along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water, even though it makes a mess. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water. On Happys first day, his mum drops him off and he is excited. He goes to play with Norrie and Roly and has loads of fun baking, playing with toys and jumping over puddles, but Happy cant do it.

programme.title: Hey Duggees Squirrel Club
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Leek, who wont let anything, not even the chilly conditions backstage, stop him from singing his song Cant Hold Me Down.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Timmy is having a blue day and collects all the blue toys, blue cushions and blue paint. However, when it comes to painting a picture, he quickly discovers hes going to need more than just one colour.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: As the children arrive, there is a rainbow over the school. Mrs Farrell points it out to Bryn before they head inside to create their own rainbow on the carpet. The rainbow has disappeared and the rain has stopped, so some of the children go outside for a game of hide-and-seek in the forest area. They soon find a hammock and take it in turns to try it out whilst the others sing a nursery rhyme. Back inside, its time for some more nursery rhymes with music teacher Miss Usher.

programme.title: Big Cook Little Cook
programme.desc: Big Cook Jen and Little Cook Small are playing superheroes today and are ready to save the world. But poor Jen has ripped her cape! Meanwhile, theyre visited by Pickle Power Girl, a real superhero.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two tapirs, Inca and Mani - a mother and her son. These incredible animals are almost like three animals in one, with a body resembling a pig, the feet of a rhino and the nose of an elephant. Next, they head into the dark to encounter another animal that loves fruit: the fruit bat, or flying fox. Hanging upside down, the flying foxes feed nearby, giving Aneeshwar and Lizzie the chance to meet these furry-faced bats.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Astronomer Carole explains how her astronomy binoculars help her to see stars and planets in the night sky.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Hearing dog Diesel visits Woofton library to work on Rayanes homework project, which is all about sound. But when their timer goes missing, Diesel needs his super ears to find it!

programme.title: Do You Know?
programme.desc: Maddie is at home to show us how a refrigerator works. She explains how the pump and the long pipes inside a fridge change a cooling liquid into a gas to help the food inside stay cold. Using a special thermal camera we see how food cools down inside. Next, Maddie heads to a mushroom farm to see how mushrooms are grown in a big factory. We see how the climate is controlled by a computer so the mushrooms can grow indoors all year round.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `bag and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different bags: a big bag, a tiny bag and a shiny bag. Theres a sleeping bag, a beeping bag and even a leaping bag! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dees friend finally succeeds in saying todays word!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Its a lovely day for a picnic, but one of the flapjacks is missing. Three may have forgotten what Numberblocks do best.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Z likes a good snooze, filling the air with floaty zeds, but when Z zaps his zeds, young Y and his yak set off on a quest to find them.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: The Wonderblocks help The Three Bears get ready for some rainy day fun!

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Yellow is happy to bring his colour to Colourland. Learn about the colour yellow with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is a big, friendly dog who runs The Squirrel Club, an after-school activity club where children can learn and take part in all kinds of activities, have fun adventures, and earn badges for their achievements.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Yukee is struggling with a tune on her ukulele, so she tells her friends shes going to give it up. When Twinkle agrees that Yukee should try a new instrument, Yukee realises that sometimes a struggle comes before success.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Justin and his friends go on a roarsome adventure to a dinosaur park, while Mr Tumble visits Shopkeeper Tumble in `The Shop with the Lot to buy Tumble Ted a birthday present.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies do conga dances over the hills, then they conga into Home Dome to answer the Tubby Phone and do a special conga Tubby Phone Dance. In Tummy Tales, the children have lots of fun as they conga around a soft play centre.

programme.title: Andys Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Andy goes in search of the woolly rhino, travelling back 50,000 years to a snowy prehistoric mountain range. But can he find the rhinos favourite food and get back to his time-travelling clock before it returns to the museum?

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Waffle discovers he has a talent for painting Mrs Hobbss cat, George, and decides to share his work with her as a way to get in her good books.

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Topsy and Tim wallpaper their parents bedroom with Dad, but he isnt very good at decorating and they get in a terrible mess. The twins decide its an emergency and remember who they can call for help.

programme.title: Whats on Your Head?
programme.desc: Rajvatan, who is a Sikh, tells us all about his terrific turban and what it means for him to wear it.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present a noisy set of chimes, but she doesnt want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on a forested planet and learn a game called impish ball. But before they can play, they must help the locals build a nest while distracting a mischievous beaverling.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: While testing out the new Terra-Gup 6, Tweak crash lands in the desert.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Volcanic smoke blocks all three suns, and Big Lizard becomes worryingly cold. Cosima needs a red-hot solution.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Supertato, the worlds first potato superhero as he tackles the mischievous Evil Pea, in the supermarket aisles.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is making jam but Naughty Monkey steals all of Duggees fruit. Can the squirrels help catch him?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Spilled Milk
programme.desc: When Peter, Lily and Benjamin accidentally spill Mittenss milk, they launch a daring mission to replace it.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Mrs Farrell and the children create a class charter - a list of rules to follow to all get along with one another at school. The class puts the rules into practice by sharing together and being kind to each other. Ottilie and Felicity find out how to look after the Giant African land snails. Leon takes charge of keeping the classroom tidy and ends up being awarded a certificate for all his hard work.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Preston needs to knock down his shed, and Mojo has the wrecking ball to do it. But first, Mojo and Bo have to get it all the way across town, which is harder than it sounds!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey wants to know why Dads always bossing her around when she doesnt get what she wants.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: A mystery gossiper causes friction on the berg until Brinicle sets a clever trap.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Following Dodge at Pup School, a place full of mishaps and mayhem. Dodge and his pup pals turn school days into adventures with singing, silliness, and occasional squeaky toys.

programme.title: Waffles After School Club
programme.desc: The After School Clubbers plan a surprise birthday party for Waffle, and Mrs Hobbs lures Waffle with cake and a puppuccino machine. The celebration ends with a song and messy faces.

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Its early morning on the longest day of the year. Oona and her friends have a special tradition of meeting up to watch the sunrise, to celebrate the start of summer.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: - Summer:Its Time to Meet a New Baby
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran spend the day with Navid and his new baby, Akeel. JoJo tries to play with Akeel, but he either cries or sleeps! Gran Gran shows JoJo a video of when she was a baby, and she realises she was just like Akeel too!

programme.title: Moon and Me
programme.desc: Pepi Nana finds a set of picture cards on the toy house kitchen table. The pictures are of Pepi Nana doing her favourite things. She arranges them in a list and then does them all in Storyland.

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Tiny Clanger discovers a space tortoise deep down in the caves. It has been woken up by a new tune Tiny has been playing, a tune that Tiny heard coming from the sky!

programme.title: In the Night Garden
programme.desc: Igglepiggle and Upsy Daisy are best friends, but now Igglepiggle cant find Upsy Daisy.

programme.desc: Dolly Parton invites all to get stuck in the mud with her farmyard friends in this fun-filled Bedtime Story!

programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz are off to County Durham to pick up a 1961 Austin Healey 3000. The car is owned by former engineer John. John had planned to completely restore the car as a retirement project however when he was struck down with Parkinsons disease.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Chris McCausland in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Leah Charles-King helps Sarah and Andy find the perfect place for their whole family, including their beloved dog, Ruby, on Spains southern Costa Blanca, for their budget of £160k.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Mike takes living conditions back to basics at a 200-year-old mountain village in Spain. In France, Paul and Yip balance the demands of unstable structures in their hamlet.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Erin and JB scale new heights to fix a leaky roof. Sarah and George try to makeover an entire cottage on a tiny budget. Stephanie starts a project creating a tartan-inspired apartment.

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Almería, the Garners help Sue and Don find their dream holiday home. The Hamiltons search for a beachfront property in Málaga for sports fanatic and former client Neal.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Can a fox-red Labrador called Bear impress two would-be owners without putting his paw in it? And 88-year-old identical twins hope that pint-sized Alfie will join them at the pub.

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Greg Davies and Alex Horne return as Ania Magliano, Maisie Adam, Phil Ellis, Reece Shearsmith and Sanjeev Bhaskar deem themselves brave enough to compete for the coveted trophy: Gregs golden head.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: A compilation of best bits from recent episodes of `8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown hosted by Jimmy Carr, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent, featuring Jon Richardson, Joe Wilkinson, Richard Ayoade, Judi Love, Roisin Conaty, Lee Mack, and many more.

programme.title: Big Fat Quiz: Best Bits
programme.desc: From James Corden and Sean Lock to Rose Matafeo and Jonathan Ross, this special episode looks back on 20 years of Big Fat Quizzing with Jimmy Carr and some dazzling dream-team duos.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Love Bites is a small restaurant in Saugerties, N.Y., run by childhood sweethearts who have trouble separating their work and personal lives; Gordon Ramsay steps in to save both the cafe and the couples engagement.

programme.title: The Inheritance
programme.desc: Devious new game with Elizabeth Hurley and Robert Rinder. A player is brutally cut from The Deceaseds will, and alliances buckle as the remaining group battle to outdo each other.

programme.title: The Inheritance
programme.desc: Devious new game with Elizabeth Hurley and Robert Rinder. The players prepare for The Deceaseds famed Estate Festival, but a crucial instruction is missed... Whose head will roll?

programme.title: The Inheritance
programme.desc: Devious new game with Elizabeth Hurley and Robert Rinder. Secrets and lies swirl around the estate. With another cut Iooming, the Prime Beneficiary is more powerful than ever.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer present a series offering advice on buying a new home.

programme.title: Department
programme.desc: A suspended cop joins an inspectors fight against organised crime.

programme.title: Cinebuzz
programme.desc: The host interviews various media personalities, shares the latest news of the Bollywood industry and reviews the newest movies.

programme.title: Cakewalk
programme.desc: A young woman who works as a chef faces various challenges as she tries to maintain a balance between her personal and professional commitments.

programme.title: Sharafat Gayi Tel Lene
programme.desc: A mysterious source deposits 100 crores into Prithvi account. A top-notch henchman calls him asking him to deliver the sum to various places from time-to-time.

programme.title: Kya Kehna
programme.desc: A single woman struggles to raise her child on her own while her childhood friend secretly pines for her.

programme.title: Halla Bol
programme.desc: A self-centred, manipulative and arrogant Bollywood actor witnesses a murder committed by the sons of a government minister but decides to stay silent.

programme.title: Fighter
programme.desc: Shamsher Pathania fulfils his lifelong dream and becomes a member of the Indian air force. As he faces rigorous challenges, Patty must rise above his own limitations to become a true hero.

programme.title: Student of the Year
programme.desc: Dean Yoginder Vashisht, retired, has fallen gravely ill. Students from his final year at St Theresas College rush to his side.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: Two estranged, street-fighting brothers square off against each other in a mixed martial arts tournament.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Following the accidental death of his parents, Abbas Khan inherits the entire wealth estate and property. The police feel that his situation is vulnerable, as they suspect his parents death was not accidental. They arrange for a full-time personal bodyguard in the shape and form of Inspector Rajveer Singh. After a series of misadventures, the child takes a liking to Rajveer, and so does the childs parents secretary.

programme.desc: A satirical look at news, trends, pop culture, current events, politics, sports, and entertainment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One That Could Have Been
programme.desc: In the second episode showing what could have happened to the friends had their lives taken different paths, Carol and Ross decide to have a threesome to spice up their marriage, while Rachel goes to Joeys and kisses him and then catches Barry cheating.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler gets into trouble with his homemade gift for Monica, Ross tries to teach martial arts to Rachel and Phoebe, and Joey hires a look-alike.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Unable to pull off this weeks pickleball and coffee shop challenges, the losing Jokers are forced to participate in an overseas game show hosted by special guest Paul Scheer.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The jokers are posing as salesmen and must sell their bizarre products to focus group participants, then attempt a challenge that turns out to be a mouthful; Sal finds himself in a stinky situation in tonights punishment with guest star Kal Penn.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Schmidts plans for his 29th birthday fall apart when he loses the reservation for his party bus, so Jess takes charge and plans a last-minute substitute party and manages to wangle a yellow school bus for the gang. Nicks new girlfriend Julia gets wind of the event and wont be dissuaded from coming along to meet his mates while Schmidts nit-picking friend Benjamin soon finds fault with everything.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Nick tells Julia how much he enjoys spending time with her, but when she responds by saying that she doesnt want to put a label on their relationship he is anxious and disappointed. Meanwhile, Jess enlists Julia to help her get out of paying for a traffic ticket, but feels annoyed when Julia isnt very friendly towards her. Elsewhere, Winston tries to hook up with a former date but finds that he has lost influence with her.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Eve returns home for a weekend visit, and Vanessa tries to re-create a childhood tradition for the girls. Jen asks Ed and Chuck for help in finding out who is stealing her work lunches. Later, Kristins big day finally arrives.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: A series of time jumps finds Mike and Vanessa with two new grandchildren, as well as Mandy and Kyle living with them; Vanessa and Mandy clash over Vanessas "helpfulness"; Chuck desperately hopes its last call on Eds mixology happy hour.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Frank and Marie announce they are moving into a retirement home and sell their house to Robert and Amy.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra discover that Frank and Marie are going to be thrown out of their apartment.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray discovers that Debra becomes more passionate when she argues with Marie, so he concocts a series of lies in an attempt to boost his love life.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray has to tell Debra that the PTA has a problem with the way she dresses.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler in a Box
programme.desc: The friends have a Thanksgiving meal together, Monica is reminded of Richard when she tries to kiss his son, and Joey frees Chandler from the box that hes being kept in to stop Kathy leaving him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Theyre Going to Party!
programme.desc: Monica upsets Phoebe by stopping the catering business before it has started after she gets the head chef job at a restaurant where the staff all hate her, and Rachels boss is killed in a car accident before she can make Rachel a junior buyer.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl From Poughkeepsie
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship, Chandlers well-intended attempts to get Rachel a date seem to miss the mark, and Monicas plan to assert some authority at her new restaurant goes awry.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes half-brother makes an astounding announcement and a thought-provoking request, while Joey finds himself in a class struggle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe undergoes an embryo implant procedure to become a surrogate mother for her brother and his wife, and Monica and Rachel wager their apartment in a trivia game against Chandler and Joey.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel schemes to get a handsome client to ask her on a date, while Chandlers jealousy causes problems with his girlfriend. Elsewhere, after losing a bet, Monica and Rachel must swap their apartment with Chandler and Joeys.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Dirty Day
programme.desc: Charlton Heston finds Joey in a compromising position during a movie shoot. Meanwhile, Rachel regrets asking Ross for a favour, as he ends up spending the weekend in a Vermont cabin with Emily.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Rugby
programme.desc: Ross takes up rugby to impress Emily, and Chandler sets up a ruse to avoid his former girlfriend Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fake Party
programme.desc: Rachel throws a surprise party for Emily so she can invite Joshua; Phoebe develops a craving for meat.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Free Porn
programme.desc: Ross acts on Monicas advice and tells Emily that he loves her just before her departure for London. Unfortunately Emilys immediate response isnt exactly reassuring. Elsewhere, Phoebe receives some rather surprising news about her pregnancy, while Chandler and Joey are glued to their TV for fear of losing the free pornography channel they are suddenly receiving.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels New Dress
programme.desc: Ross has concerns about Emilys interests, and Rachels plans for Joshua are upset by a late change of venue.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Haste
programme.desc: Ross tries to keep Emily from returning to London, and Monica and Rachel attempt to win back their apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Wedding Dresses
programme.desc: Distraught over Rosss engagement, Rachel suggests to Joshua that he marry her, even though theyve only been on four dates. Meanwhile, Monica and Phoebe pick up Emilys wedding dress from a bridal shop, but Monica tries it on and loves it so much she wont take it off. Phoebe also buys one for herself.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Ross reminisce separately about when they dated each other, and the friends get invitations to Rosss wedding, but not all of them are going.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Worst Best Man Ever
programme.desc: Chandler and Joey vie for the position of best man for Ross wedding ceremony. Ross chooses Joey after Chandler inadvertently insults Ross, but Joey loses Ross treasured wedding ring. Elsewhere, Phoebe suffers extreme mood swings because of her pregnancy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel, Monica, Joey, Chandler and Ross go to London for the wedding where Joey meets Sarah Ferguson, the Duchess of York.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr, Sean Lock and Jon Richardson are joined by Josh Widdicombe, Dr Christian Jessen, Kimberley Walsh and Russell Kane to debate the hot topics of the week by examining surveys, opinion polls and statistics.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Highlights from series 11, hosted by Jimmy Carr with team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson. With guests Jack Dee, Jedward, Sarah Millican, Amy Childs, Micky Flanagan, Jack Whitehall, Charlie Brooker and Gok Wan.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Butt-Head loses his braces and realises hes beautiful; middle-aged Butt-Head suffers a heart attack and its up to Beavis to save him.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head work for their childhood hero, Todd; Beavis and Butt-Head try to get A.I. to do their homework.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Goth Kids 3: Dawn of the Posers

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: In the Eye of the Storm

Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: The Gambler: The Adventure Continues

programme.title: The Ride to Hangmans Tree
programme.desc: Two outlaws are rescued by an old friend, just as they are to be hung as thieves. After going their separate ways, the two bandits decide to join up with their rescuer, who has become the infamous `Black Bandit - the nemesis of the Wells Fargo line.

programme.title: Legend Lowdown

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: As Mr Spock conducts his own defense, the Enterprise receives transmissions from Talos IV detailing Capt Pikes first encounter with the Talosians.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies old comrade from the wartime O.S.S. brings news that several members of their intelligence unit have been murdered.

programme.title: The Fall Guy

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: Walker must decide whether to help stop a new threat, or be by Alexs side for the birth of their child.

programme.title: Drive Angry
programme.desc: A deceased criminal breaks out of Hell to save his baby grand-daughter from a Satanic cult.

programme.title: Half Past Dead
programme.desc: Sascha Petrosevitch is a widowed undercover agent posing as a tough, international car thief. He has many friends on both sides of the law. One of them, career criminal Nick Frazier, has been like a brother to him. One night while on a heist job, Sascha and Nick are intercepted by a female FBI agent, EZ Williams, who, unbeknownst to Nick, is working in tandem with Sascha.

programme.title: Mindscape
programme.desc: A detective who can probe peoples minds must determine if a troubled teenager is a sociopath capable of murder, or a victim of trauma.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In the near future, global warming turns parts of the American Midwest into a desert. In its attempt to take hold of the economic recession, a government agency called the Humanity Bureau exiles members of society deemed unproductive, and banishes them to a colony known as New Eden. An ambitious and impartial caseworker Noah Kross investigates a case appealed by a single mother and her son. Knowing the unjust fate of the innocent boy, Kross sets off to save the lives of the mother and child.

programme.desc: Mal and Sue from Suffolk fell in love with Spain over fifteen years ago and now want to retire there. For their budget of £70,000, Danni Menzies shows them five properties around Vera.

programme.desc: The competition takes place in and around Sheffield where first host chocolate shop manager - and party girl - Ginnette hopes to win over her guests with a menu of fun family favourites.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.desc: At a Welsh castle, Drew solves a centuries-old salvage mystery, but finding hidden treasure proves trickier than expected. In Somerset, a school is clearing out its storage areas.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard runs a decorative salvage yard and is constantly looking for new stock.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Margherita Taylor helps a couple who have £500,000 to make a much-yearned-for leap to a country life on the Welsh borders. Along the way, Margherita visits Tredegar House, now home to local artists studios, and lends a hand making traditional Welsh musical instruments.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is on a house-hunting mission in south Worcestershire with a young couple who have just got engaged and are looking for their first joint house purchase with a budget of £300,000. Jules also tries his hand at jewelling with a master gilder from Royal Worcester Porcelain.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: In a quiet South London suburb, Drew comes face to face with the most extraordinary collection of American automobilia hes ever seen, including Evel Knievels Messerschmitt.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Modern day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard travels the length and breadth of the country in search of weird and wonderful objects. The bigger the hoard, the happier he is.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Raj Bisram and Paul Martins Way Out West tour takes them to deepest Dorset, Devon, Somerset and beyond. Antiques experts and firm friends, our pair share a common goal: to make big profits at the auction in Worcestershire. Along the way, Paul ditches the classic car to investigate the obscure, Somerset-based Victorian inventor of unmanned powered flight, before having a go at a bit of modern model aeronautics himself.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It is the final leg of our journey with veteran tripper Raj Bisram and relative rookie Paul Martin. After an epic tour of the south and south west, their shopping and saleroom extravaganza concludes at a Palladian mansion in the Cotswolds. The open-topped classic car transports our duo to Shakespeare country, Warwickshire, where dealer Paul and auctioneer Raj hope to acquire anything going for a sonnet. They find out about alpacas and llamas, and discover the historical roots of ballet.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team perform house clearances and uncover hidden gems. What will these antiques sell for at auction?

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Stuart hopes Angus can help him raise enough cash to adapt a house for his poorly wifes needs, so she can live her final years in comfort.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Its the fourth leg of this Scottish extravaganza with auctioneer Izzie Balmer and dealer David Harper. As it happens, theyll be awfully close to St Andrews, the home of golf, so perhaps we should call it leg fore! For their rummage around Fife, Perthshire and Angus, Izzie and David have a trusty vintage Mini and whatever funds they have successfully accrued on top of their £200 starting sum. Izzie finds a very rare jar that results in a bidding war at auction, much to Davids despair.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: On the final leg of this Caledonian caper, auctioneer Izzie Balmer and dealer David Harper hit the Highlands proper. These antiques experts will be pootling along both the high and low roads of north east Scotland in this final, nail-biting episode. While shopping, David falls under the stare of a man from 1860, but jewellery expert Izzie plays it safe and picks up something sparkly.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: The volunteer crews of the RNLIs 238 lifeboat stations can be paged at any time, day or night, calling them away from friends, families and colleagues to head out into the unknown. On the north eastern tip of the Scottish mainland, the crew at Wick begin a frantic search to find a paddleboarder who has drifted a mile out to sea, while her family wait anxiously on the shore.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: In Thurso, Scotlands most northerly mainland station, the crew race to the rescue of an ocean-going rower whos run into trouble 40 miles out to sea. In Dungeness, on the Kent coast, there are two very different shouts for the crew to deal with.

programme.title: Helicopter ER
programme.desc: The team join firefighters trying to rescue the victim of an 11,000-volt electric shock. An elderly motorist needs help after a bizarre accident.

programme.title: Help! My House is Haunted
programme.desc: Alice and her family moved into their Barnsley home two years ago, only to be plagued by terrifying paranormal activity. The team unearths a mining explosion that killed over 300, with some bodies never discovered.

programme.title: Help! My House is Haunted
programme.desc: Horse breeder Matt is being tormented by sinister paranormal activity at his 17th farmhouse. The team have a tough job on their hands trying to track down these spirits, find out what they want, and bring peace back to the farmhouse.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: National Trust: National Treasures
programme.desc: Explore Castle Ward in Strangford, County Down, an 18th-century mansion famed for its mixture of architectural styles. Can Classical and Gothic styles work in unity? Narrated by Nigel Havers.

programme.title: Anne Sophie Mutter, John Williams and Friends: A Celebration
programme.desc: Superstar violinist Anne-Sophie Mutter celebrates her 60th birthday year with a performance she created with her friends and musical colleagues.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross paints a frozen lake and snow drifts below a warm sunset sky and late autumn foliage.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob introduces his talented son Steve who is painting a mountain river scene within an oval frame. He demonstrates how to blend crimson into the water, sky, and shrubs.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: The FBI make plans to wiretap the Soprano family home, and Patsy begins asking questions regarding the death of his twin brother.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: With the help of Ciro, Enzo launches new operations in Naples. However, the traffic does not go unnoticed by the citys existing bosses.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Enzo and his crew are under attack, but Ciro advises caution before retaliating. Plus, Genny approaches Scianel to help finance his own war.

programme.title: Shaolin Soccer
programme.desc: A Shaolin monk-warrior who has trouble finding work, transfers his skills, and those of his fellow monks to football.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Outside influences affect the way the worlds first thinking, feeling robot lives and behaves.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: Ace assassin Arthur Bishop becomes a target when he agrees to teach reckless Steve the art of contract killing.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Loose-cannon cops Lowrey and Burnett reduce Miami to rubble as they try to stop Cuban and Russian drug smugglers from flooding Florida with ecstasy.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: After he accidentally destroys the winter food supply of his fellow Liberty Park residents, Surly, a squirrel, is banished to the streets of Oakton. Luckily, Surly finds the towns nut shop and hatches a plan to plunder its bounty. However, unbeknown to Surly and his ragtag team of animal associates, the nut shop is really a front for mobsters who plan to rob the bank next door. While Surly and his team break in to the shop, the mobsters carry out their own scheme.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: After he accidentally destroys the winter food supply of his fellow Liberty Park residents, Surly, a squirrel, is banished to the streets of Oakton. Luckily, Surly finds the towns nut shop and hatches a plan to plunder its bounty. However, unbeknown to Surly and his ragtag team of animal associates, the nut shop is really a front for mobsters who plan to rob the bank next door. While Surly and his team break in to the shop, the mobsters carry out their own scheme.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: When his wickedness is challenged, super-villain Gru hatches a plan to steal the Moon. Enlisting three young orphans to help out, his dastardly plot is derailed when he begins to care for them.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: The Nut Job

programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks wedding anniversary celebrations are rudely interrupted by evil wizard Clavius, who once again wants to conquer the world. When Clavius kidnaps Queen Uberta, Odette and Derek must put a stop to his fiendish schemes.

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: The humans and animals believe a werewolf is on the loose, so former hunter Shaw uses the opportunity to re-open the season. Boog, Elliot, and Mr Weenie have to face their fears and find the werewolf to get the season closed permanently.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians

Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Hope Springs
programme.desc: A woman drags her skeptical husband to a renowned counsellors marriage retreat to try to put the spark back in their relationship.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: The 90s: Cinemas Greatest Decade
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decades greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: The 90s: Cinemas Greatest Decade

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: My First Summer
programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property, 16-year-old Claudia finds her sheltered world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears in her garden, and the pair find a connection they both need.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: John Thornton is an Irish-American boxer who, after a professional tragedy, returns to Ireland to retire. There, he meets and falls for the fiery Mary Kate Danaher, much to the disgust of her brother Squire Will Danaher.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: My First Summer
programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property, 16-year-old Claudia finds her sheltered world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears in her garden, and the pair find a connection they both need.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Bernard Jordan, a World War II veteran, sneaks out of his care home to attend the 70th anniversary commemoration of the D-Day landings in Normandy.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Girl You Know Its True
programme.desc: Grammy Award-winning music act Milli Vanilli become the first act to have their prize stripped from them after they are exposed as a fake enterprise with the singers lip-syncing to pre-recorded tracks.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Paul Blart takes his teenage daughter with him to Las Vegas for a security-guard expo. While there, he stumbles upon a heist and must single-handedly apprehend the crooks.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss childrens book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens novel, `Oliver Twist, as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Paul Blart takes his teenage daughter with him to Las Vegas for a security-guard expo. While there, he stumbles upon a heist and must single-handedly apprehend the crooks.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Following another successful mission, International Rescue faces a crisis when its space station, Thunderbird 5, is damaged by a suspected meteor strike. However, criminal mastermind Aristotle Spode, aka the Hood, is waiting for the team to vacate their secret island base so that he can take control and learn more about their operation.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: While visiting London with his family, Jack Ryan foils an IRA attempt to assassinate a government minister, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, the IRAs Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the networks money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the citys subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Bad Boys

Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Promising business executive Tim is desperate to impress his boss and be promoted. Having secured a huge contract with a Swiss businessman, his manager invites him to an exclusive dinner party where the employee who brings along the most eccentric guest earns a trophy and the praise of the assembled executives. He finds the perfect candidate in a strange IRS employee, but things soon start to fall apart.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: While shooting a war film, the director attempts to liven up proceedings by dropping the principle actors into the middle of a real jungle, claiming he is going to capture their performance with hidden cameras. The hapless group including drug-addled comedy star Jeff Portnoy and po-faced method man Kirk Lazarus are completely unaware when a series of unfortunate events leads them into the middle of a real war zone.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: When Set, the Egyptian god of darkness, manages to ascend to the throne of the Egyptian empire. Mortal Bek and the God of the sky Horus join together to save the world and Beks love.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Promising business executive Tim is desperate to impress his boss and be promoted. Having secured a huge contract with a Swiss businessman, his manager invites him to an exclusive dinner party where the employee who brings along the most eccentric guest earns a trophy and the praise of the assembled executives. He finds the perfect candidate in a strange IRS employee, but things soon start to fall apart.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies PI company is approached by Eric Knox, owner of Knox Technologies, whose revolutionary voice-recognition software has been stolen. Angels Natalie, Dylan and Alex are sent to place a bug in the system of bitter rival Roger Corwin, who is under strong suspicion, but after the deed is done, the Angels and their sidekick Bosley face the fact of a destroyed home base as well as Charlies life in immediate danger.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The girls are on the hunt for two gold rings that hold the new identities of every single person who has entered the FBIs Witness Protection Program. When some of them turn up dead, the race is on to find the perpetrators, while using their cunning, guile, martial arts and amazing outfits to get what they want.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Anyone but You
programme.desc: Despite having an amazing first date, Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour. When they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, the pair pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: When Set, the Egyptian god of darkness, manages to ascend to the throne of the Egyptian empire. Mortal Bek and the God of the sky Horus join together to save the world and Beks love.
