programme.title: Heart Eyes
programme.desc: A masked maniac with glowing, red eyes returns every Valentines Day to slaughter unsuspecting couples. When a cynical ad executive and her hopelessly romantic colleague become the next target, they decide to fight back and end the reign of terror.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: After responding to an emergency call from a mysterious woman, a young locksmith gets unwittingly caught in the crosshairs of a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her M?ori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helms daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A poor young man is wrongly charged with drug trafficking after being deceived. An ex-prosecutor investigates the case, uncovers a corrupt lawyer teams scheme, and restores justice despite obstruction from evil forces.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helms daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A poor young man is wrongly charged with drug trafficking after being deceived. An ex-prosecutor investigates the case, uncovers a corrupt lawyer teams scheme, and restores justice despite obstruction from evil forces.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Disturbing visions and her sisters disappearance lead a woman to call a cop and a psychic to her childhood home.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Disturbing visions and her sisters disappearance lead a woman to call a cop and a psychic to her childhood home.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies PI company is approached by Eric Knox, owner of Knox Technologies, whose revolutionary voice-recognition software has been stolen. Angels Natalie, Dylan and Alex are sent to place a bug in the system of bitter rival Roger Corwin, who is under strong suspicion, but after the deed is done, the Angels and their sidekick Bosley face the fact of a destroyed home base as well as Charlies life in immediate danger.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Sky Originals
programme.desc: Dive into a world of unmissable Sky Original films.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Based on the play by Morgan Lloyd Malcolm.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: Mobster moll Gloria, fresh out of prison, finds shes the guardian of Nicky, just six years of age but the only one with the information that will finger her ex Kevin who put her inside, and see him get his just desserts (and her some of his dough).

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his familys ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realise theyre at the centre of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: One mans brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after its revealed hes a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: The disturbing story of the making of the infamous 60s underworld figures Reggie and Ronnie Kray - from their upbringing by a domineering mother in the deprivation of Londons East End. The gangland empire they build is characterised by violence and intimidation, and the film is unflinching in its depiction of their rise to power.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

The Wimbledon Kidnapping
programme.desc: On 29th December, Muriel McKay disappeared from her suburban home in Wimbledon. Such was the strangeness of the case that everyone from the police, family, Fleet Street, and hundreds of clairvoyants all struggled to decipher the vanishing of the respectable 55-year-old housewife. Now, one of the men convicted for this extraordinary crime, and the families of both the kidnapped woman and the convicted murderers speak for the first time.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: When a Terrorbird appears during an incursion, the team are faced with an anomaly that they cannot lock, causing chaos as the terrified creature struggles to get home. Also, Ethans secrets are finally revealed as he takes his revenge on Emily and the team.

programme.sub-title: Make a Teenager Watch This Case!; Shot in the Arm While Driving!

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: When Friends Cut Friends?!; Judge Judys Big Emergency Account?!
programme.desc: A man claims his close friend cut him with a new knife because he didnt like his jokes. A college student says she was a victim of a check-cashing scam, but its her mother who suffers a loss from her secret bank account.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Three Indiana construction workers are found shot on a work site.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a gym teacher was found shot to death, the police suspect his wife of foul play, and a videotape recorded by the victim reveals his strange marriage.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A Texan who vows to live a reformed life after being released from prison is subsequently convicted of murder, despite insisting his innocence, so he uses forensic science from behind bars to try to prove his case.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: The Truth About My Murder
programme.desc: Dr Richard Shepherd investigates the murders of Sam Herr and Julie Kibuishi, both shot for financial gain by a former theatre actor who was planning an expensive wedding despite being deeply in debt.

programme.title: The Truth About My Murder
programme.desc: Dr Richard Shepherd investigates the 2013 murder of taxi driver William Spiller, who was brutally stabbed to death before being dismembered and stored in boxes used as a TV stand.

programme.title: Facing Evil

programme.desc: Theres only one Judge Judy! With her outspoken style and hard-hitting decisiveness, Judge Judy single-handedly sorts out family disputes and misdemeanours, one case at a time.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Widower Waiters Bailout; Colliding Bike Boy
programme.desc: Former friends fight over bail money; a 12-year-old boy is accused of crashing his bike into a moving car.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Karate Camp Neglect?; Bad House Sitter?; Sister Fight!
programme.desc: A mother accuses a karate teacher of leaving her sons unsupervised; a house sitter is sued for totaling a vehicle, stealing money and neglecting animals; sisters feud over impound fees and traffic tickets.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Dog Blamed for Violent Crash; Roommate Disaster
programme.desc: A motorcyclist says an unleashed dog ran into traffic and caused a collision in which his wife was injured; former roommates feud over unpaid rent, personal property and storage fees.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Former flatmates argue over living expenses, and a woman sues her dads girlfriend for rent and personal property.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: House Mayhem; Frenemies; Under the Influence
programme.desc: A former tenant wants his security deposit back, even though he missed rent payments, and ex-friends dispute rehab, a smashed windshield and a loan.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Engagement Ring Custody; Accusations of Murder
programme.desc: Theres only one Judge Judy! With her outspoken style and hard-hitting decisiveness, Judge Judy single-handedly sorts out family disputes and misdemeanours, one case at a time.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Vandalism Excuse at Its Finest?!; Amazing Townhouse Profit?!
programme.desc: A woman claims she caught her estranged friend cutting down all the mobiles on her front porch. A woman sells her home for three times what she paid for it and then sues a previous tenant for repairs.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Big Bucks Fish Tank Botch?!; Lovers Lexus Mix-Up!
programme.desc: A custom fish tank arrives at its destination damaged. Plus, a man claims that his ex-lover fraudulently registered his car under her name.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Hair Stylist Left in the Dark?!; Solar Tree Trimming Disaster?!
programme.desc: A stylist whose works electricity was switched off claims all of her property was stolen. Plus, a married couple sue a solar power salesman for damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Woman Desperate for Degrading Job?!; The Infamous Afghanistan Scam?!
programme.desc: A generous friend steps in when a woman claims that she is willing to work as a paid escort to cover her overdue bills. A woman sends money to a man she has never met in person who says that he is trapped in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Fraud Squad NHS
programme.desc: The Fraud Squad hunts down a serial scam artist faking disability to claim thousands of pounds in insurance payouts, and uncovers the most prolific dental fraudster ever. Plus, a preacher turns prisoner when hes caught with his hand in the public purse.

programme.title: Killers: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Each case is pieced together like a jigsaw as a team of investigators link CCTV, home surveillance, police body camera, and mobile phone footage that builds the evidence necessary to catch a killer.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: Detectives and forensic experts recount the most extraordinary cold cases that were solved using the revolutionary technique of familial DNA testing. Featuring interviews with family members, police and more.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: When word goes around town that Old Heptonstall is looking for volunteers, Hobbo and his army of volunteers, namely Alvin and Entwistle, go and visit him without a second thought. They find that he has a bad leg and is confined to the shed, where at least he doesnt have to listen to his wifes snoring. Tearfully, Heptonstall tells them he wants to go to the churchyard and bury a very dear friend.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Behind Every Bush There Is Not Necessarily a Howard
programme.desc: Hobbo enlists the services of his `team to help Toby win back the affections of his ex-wife, Glenda decides to make it her mission to find Morton a woman, and Howard sneaks into the library to tell Marina theres a problem with their bike ride that afternoon - Pearl is going out too. Meanwhile, PCs Cooper and Walsh try out a new in-car fryer.

programme.title: Hi-De-Hi!
programme.desc: Ex-jockey Fred Quilly once took a bribe to fix a race, but failed to keep the horse from winning. Now he is convinced that the betting gang have tracked him down and are out for revenge.

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright takes action when his corner shop is broken into and employs a large dog to guard his property. Unfortunately, the unruly creature is more successful at keeping customers at bay than frightening any burglars who may be about.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Pearl throws Howard out of the house, but when he goes to Cleggs for sympathy it falls on deaf ears, while Pearl tells Nelly shes going to have to sort out Howard once and for all. Meanwhile, Glenda decides that Barry and herself are fat and that something must be done before Glorias wedding, and forces Barry to embark on a new fitness regime.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Rights of Man (Except for Howard)
programme.desc: Hobbo decides that the still-homeless Howard needs to show Pearl whos boss, but after Pearl slams the door in his face, Howard is despondent. Hobbo is insistent that Howard just needs to remind Pearl of the good times, but will his bicycle skills be enough to win her back? Meanwhile, Marina helps Miss Davenport upgrade her appearance, and decides to seize the moment with Mr Waddle.

programme.desc: Its Comic Relief Day and the office is awash with wackiness. Keith is squeezed into a bright yellow Ali G costume, Sheila has become Wonder Woman and Gareth is hopping on one leg. Hobbo is insistent that Howard just needs to remind Pearl of the good times, but will his bicycle skills be enough to win her back? Meanwhile, Marina helps Miss Davenport upgrade her appearance, and decides to seize the moment with Mr Waddle.

programme.title: Hi-De-Hi!
programme.desc: Joe Maplin decrees that every Thursday will be `sunshine smile day. The camp host decides to extend this to the campers by compelling a holidaymaker caught without a smile to pay a shilling to the Campers Amenity Fund.

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright leaves his shop for a few hours to attend the funeral of a friend. Unfortunately, his thrifty nature doesnt allow him to buy a proper wreath but one the size of a button-hole.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Hobbo and his `team turn Howard into a tramp to show Pearl how rough hes been living and convince her to take him back. The men pitch him a tent but Howards isnt keen and goes for a meal with Glenda and Barry. The men return to the camp with Howard to show Pearl how much hes roughing it, but Marina arrives at the same time and Hobbo and Howard bundle her into the tent.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Glenda sends a reluctant Barry off to paint a nice view, to take his mind off wanting to eat. Meanwhile, the dejected Howard wonders if Pearl still loves him. Hobbo takes pity on him. Hobbo delivers a message from Howard to Pearl - a brief peck - but Pearl grabs him and delivers a full-blooded kiss. Howard is aghast. Elsewhere, Glenda tells the uncertain Morton that hes going to Glorias wedding as Morias guest.

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Boycie claims its just a mid-life crisis, but are there other more compelling reasons for him selling up and moving from his mock Georgian life in Peckham to a new life as a gentleman farmer in Shropshire?

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.sub-title: The Bullet Is Not for Firing
programme.desc: Captain Mainwaring calls a court of enquiry when the platoons entire ammunition supply is used up on a passing aircraft during a night exercise. Naturally, his quest for the truth ends in a shambles.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: When word goes around town that Old Heptonstall is looking for volunteers, Hobbo and his army of volunteers, namely Alvin and Entwistle, go and visit him without a second thought. They find that he has a bad leg and is confined to the shed, where at least he doesnt have to listen to his wifes snoring. Tearfully, Heptonstall tells them he wants to go to the churchyard and bury a very dear friend.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Behind Every Bush There Is Not Necessarily a Howard
programme.desc: Hobbo enlists the services of his `team to help Toby win back the affections of his ex-wife, Glenda decides to make it her mission to find Morton a woman, and Howard sneaks into the library to tell Marina theres a problem with their bike ride that afternoon - Pearl is going out too. Meanwhile, PCs Cooper and Walsh try out a new in-car fryer.

programme.title: Hi-De-Hi!
programme.desc: Ex-jockey Fred Quilly once took a bribe to fix a race, but failed to keep the horse from winning. Now he is convinced that the betting gang have tracked him down and are out for revenge.

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright takes action when his corner shop is broken into and employs a large dog to guard his property. Unfortunately, the unruly creature is more successful at keeping customers at bay than frightening any burglars who may be about.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores the post-war Britain of his youth in a journey from the Midlands to the West Country. Beginning in Derbys railway works, Michael hears how the Victorian sheds now house some of the most modern assembly lines in Britain.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Coventry, Michael recalls the destruction by the German Luftwaffe of the citys gothic cathedral in November 1940. Heading south to Royal Leamington Spa, Michael visits the Guide Dogs for the Blind National Centre, established in the town in 1941.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos railway journey reaches the heart of Warwickshire. In the Tudor town of Stratford-upon-Avon, birthplace of William Shakespeare, Michael visits the Royal Shakespeare Theatre, home since 1961 to the Royal Shakespeare Company.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: At the African and Caribbean Heritage Centre in Wolverhampton, Michael finds out about the impact of Enoch Powells 1968 speech on immigration. In Kidderminster, he discovers the site of a secret wartime enterprise known as the Drakelow Tunnels.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek makes his way to Blackpool to pick up what will be the highest priced item at the next auction. But, the 1970 Aston Martin DBS needs a tow to the local garage.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Over the years Derek has learnt to always expect the unexpected. So when Call the Midwife star, Cliff Parisi, drops off his Bedford CA campervan its just another day at the office.

programme.title: Auschwitz: The Nazis and the Final Solution
programme.desc: This episode tells the history of the most frenzied period of killing in the history of Auschwitz and the surprising story of the Nazis attempt to negotiate with the Allies.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team return to Waltham Forest Town Hall where a busy day reveals an art deco pendant with a hint of ancient Egypt, a haul of charming tiles discovered behind a chimney and a purse that saved the life of a German soldier in the First World War.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona and the team visit the Liverpool Metropolitan Cathedral, where treasures include a miniature kitchen range, a piece of the citys heritage found in a French flea market and a sextant used at sea in the race to rescue survivors of the Titanic.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Bangers and Cash spin-off series that follows the journey of a vehicle purchased at a Mathewsons classic car auction, before being repaired, restored and re-auctioned.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team pay over the odds for a VW Campervan, but can they hope to break even when they turn out a lovely bus for auction.

programme.title: Auschwitz: The Nazis and the Final Solution
programme.desc: This episode tells the history of the most frenzied period of killing in the history of Auschwitz and the surprising story of the Nazis attempt to negotiate with the Allies.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team return to Waltham Forest Town Hall where a busy day reveals an art deco pendant with a hint of ancient Egypt, a haul of charming tiles discovered behind a chimney and a purse that saved the life of a German soldier in the First World War.

programme.title: Tropic of Cancer
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels from the beautiful Pacific coast of Mexico, where he visits the luxurious holiday resorts of Baja California, before crossing the countrys rugged interior. The first stage of his journey ends in the Bahamas where he discovers the hidden menace on the beautiful coral reefs.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and Charlie head south for an immaculate Lotus Super 7. Derek and Jack are in Sheffield collecting a 1929 Riley Monaco and a 1924 Alvis 12/50 tourer.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will Trickett and Gus Gregory hunt for neglected cars they can fix and flip for a profit. Any losses incurred by their flipping come out of their own pockets.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team lift the shutters on their biggest restoration to date in the shape of a Series 1 Land Rover.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A collection of Austin Mini Metros arrive for auction. Also going under the hammer is a baby Fiat 850 coupe and a haulier offloads part of his vintage commercial vehicles collection.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon repurposes some old suitcases while Henry gives an old dresser some serious bling.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Exploring Italian ruins immortalised by Hollywood, a crumbling Chilean city with two lives and a brutalist Scottish relic whose prayers went unanswered.

programme.title: Great Indian Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos `Bradshaws 1913 Handbook of Indian, Foreign and Colonial Travel leads him on a railway journey through the modern south Indian states of Karnataka and Tamil Nadu, from the former princely state of Mysore to the first stronghold of the East India Company in Chennai,formerly Madras.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Punjab Ka Singham
programme.desc: After taking charge as the DSP of Singham Khurd, Dilsher Sikhon sets out to end the drug addiction among the youth of Punjab. This sets him against Bhuller, a vicious business tycoon with connections in high places.

programme.title: Mohenjo Daro
programme.desc: In 2016 B.C., a farmer in the Indus Valley travels to a city and saves the life of a beautiful woman.

programme.title: Shaadi Ke Side Effects
programme.desc: Two newlyweds adjust to married life and to each other.

programme.title: Hum Do Humare Do
programme.desc: An orphan mans life takes a hilarious turn when he decides to hire a duo, who share a past, to fake being his parents in an attempt to fulfil his lovers wish of marrying someone with a family.

programme.title: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic
programme.desc: After causing a car accident which kills the parents of four children, Ranbeer Talwar is sentenced to care for them until they reach the age of 18. However, the children are determined to avenge their parents.

programme.title: Ok Jaanu
programme.desc: Two ambitious people fall in love after meeting at a wedding. They decide on a no-strings-attached live-in relationship, but doubt their decision when their careers pull them apart.

programme.title: Housefull 4
programme.desc: Three pairs of reincarnated lovers reunite in the present day -- but the men wind up falling for the wrong women.

programme.title: Veer-Zaara
programme.desc: Squadron Leader Veer Pratap Singh, a pilot in the Indian air force, rescues the stranded Zaara, a woman from Pakistan, following a bus accident, and their lives are forever bound. With all the ingredients of a classic love story, the film is a tale of love, separation, courage and sacrifice that unfolds over 22 years.

programme.title: Bioscopewala
programme.desc: The story of Rehmat Khan, a man from Kabul, who used to show films to children through his Bioscope.

programme.title: Pyar Koi Khel Nahin
programme.desc: After a chance, pre-arranged meeting, Nisha and Sunil meet, fall in love, marry and move in with Sunils wealthy family.

programme.title: Madam Chief Minister
programme.desc: A feisty woman encounters political corruption at every level as she embarks on a journey to becoming the chief minister of Uttar Pradesh.

programme.title: Mere Yaar Ki Shaadi Hai
programme.desc: A man realises that he loves his childhood friend and tries to stop her upcoming wedding.

programme.title: The Zoya Factor
programme.desc: Sonam Kapoor stars as Zoya, a young and successful advertising executive who becomes the good luck charm for Indias cricket team during the World Cup. Based on the book by Anuja Chauhan of the same title.

programme.title: Dhoom
programme.desc: A gang of robbers on hi-tech motorbikes, led by the charismatic Kabir, is sweeping through Mumbai, outwitting the police at every turn. When officer Jai Dixit is assigned to catch the criminals, he reluctantly enlists the help of garage mechanic and bike enthusiast Ali. Though the pair do not see eye-to-eye at first, they soon become a formidable team, tracking their enemies from the streets of Mumbai to the beaches of Goa.

programme.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
programme.desc: An Indian living in the US decides to visit his home town with his new wife and, despite the family suggestions, they insist in staying at the ancestral home.

programme.title: Gharwali Baharwali
programme.desc: A man finds out his wife is cheating on him so he decides to re-marry and keep a second wife who will fulfil his long-term ambitions of becoming a father.

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: After marrying Kartik Goenka, Naira tries to manage her roles as a wife and daughter-in-law with equal aplomb, but she faces many challenges and struggles to overcome them.
